official_title: A bill to amend titles 14 and 38, United States Code, to provide veterans' benefits to temporary members of the United States Coast Guard Reserve, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Makes temporary members of the United States Coast Guard Reserve eligible for veterans' benefits, if they so elect.

titles.title: A bill to amend titles 14 and 38, United States Code, to provide veterans' benefits to temporary members of the United States Coast Guard Reserve, and for other purposes.
